text: Jacques Santini (born 25 April 1952) is a former French football player. ==Managerial statistics== :Source: Team Nat From To Record G W L D Win % Lyon France 1 July 2000 31 May 2002 106 55 27 24 51.88 France 21 July 2002 1 July 2004 28 22 2 4 78.57 Tottenham Hotspur England 3 June 2004 5 November 2004 13 5 4 4 38.46 Total ==Honours== ===Player=== Saint-Étienne *Division 1: 1969–70, 1973–74, 1974–75, 1975–76, 1980–81 *Coupe de France: 1969–70, 1973–74, 1974–75, 1976–77 ===Manager=== Lyon *Division 1: 2001–02 *Coupe de la Ligue: 2000–01 France *FIFA Confederations Cup: 2003 ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Bourgogne-Franche- Comté Category:French football managers Category:Territoire de Belfort
